bike.description: Specialized FACT 9r carbon, FACT IS construction, compact race design, Zertz inserts, OS BB

components.description: Specialized FACT carbon, monocoque construction, OS race for 1-3/8" bearing, full carbon legs, crown and steerer w/ Zertz inserts.
Specialized Campy style, 1-3/8" lower bearing, integrated threadless, stainless steel sealed cartridge bearings, 20mm carbon cone w/ one 10mm and two 5mm carbon spacers
Specialized Pro-Set, 3D forged alloy, 4-bolt 31.8mm bar clamp, 4- position adjustable
S-Works SL, FACT carbon handlebar, short-reach drop, 31.8mm
Body Geometry Bar Phat, cork ribbon w/ 2.5mm gel padding
Specialized FACT Pro carbon, integrated oversize design
Silver cage, black body, w/ toe clip and strap
Roval Roubaix SL, E5 alloy, machined sidewalls
Roval Roubaix SL, carbon center tube w/ alloy flanges, 24h
Roval Roubaix SL, CNC alloy body Swiss-made internals,ratchet and cassete body, 30 hole
Body Geometry Toupé Gel, carbon reinforced base, hollow Ti rails
Specialized Pro SL, FACT carbon w/ Zertz insert, 27.2mm
Carbon chain stay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
